doc.title: Controls
doc.para: Controls KAG's controls are explained below. These are general default controls. For games and other applications, some functions may not be used, so it's recommended not to simply copy and paste this into game manuals, etc. (^^)

dl.dt: "Left Click" or "Wheel Forward" or "Enter Key" or "Space Key"
dl.dd: Advance text, or select choices, press buttons, check checkboxes, etc.
Display message history or call right-click subroutine
Move between choices, buttons, single-line edits, checkboxes
